column5: I stumbled on this while researching some info on the 1000 Islands.  It is interesting to see what people can do when they put their minds to it.  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zYQDj5mKfSU
Think I will smoke a couple pounds of reefer and build a plane! No way I would go on the water in that!   People wonder why they get in trouble on the water?
I think it is pretty slick.   It would be loud though.
